p: The antimicrobial activity of the studied fractions was carried out using Gram-positive bacteria; Staphylococcus aureus, and Gram-negative bacteria; Escherichia coli (ATB: 57) B6N, Pseudomonas aeruginosa, and Klebsiella pneumonia. The antifungal activity of the studied fractions was studied using Candida albicans ATCC10231 and Saccharomyces cerevisiae ATCC9763.
